Case# PKEraserTool.EraserType.fixedWidthBitmap

iOS 16.4+iPadOS 16.4+Mac Catalyst 16.4+macOS 13.3+visionOS 1.0+Xcode 14.3+

```
case fixedWidthBitmap
```

## [See Also](/documentation/PencilKit/PKEraserTool-swift.struct/EraserType-swift.enum/fixedWidthBitmap#see-also)

### [Eraser types](/documentation/PencilKit/PKEraserTool-swift.struct/EraserType-swift.enum/fixedWidthBitmap#Eraser-types)

[`case vector`](/documentation/pencilkit/pkerasertool-swift.struct/erasertype-swift.enum/vector)An eraser that removes an entire drawn line.[`case bitmap`](/documentation/pencilkit/pkerasertool-swift.struct/erasertype-swift.enum/bitmap)An eraser that removes only those portions of the drawing it touches.
